title: it feels like Riot is trying their hardest to make the game more fast paced.
body:
I understand that they want to make Pro play more exciting to watch by having people die **a lot** more, but i feel like the rest of the player base has to suffer for it. 

What i mean by this is: If tanks are no longer playable because they will simply get melted by all the true damage that is in the game right now (or just damage in general). 

People are just going to slowly start playing all or nothing champions that need to be ahead otherwise they will become a liability to their team.

Which will start making games feel like they're over just a few minutes in... Basically a coin toss.

Instead of people being able to say: "Ok, i lost the lane so let me just sit back and farm until i am able to close the gap between me and my opponent." 


#PS: I know boards hates tanks but we need those fat bastards to balance out the game.
